bug.author: ajdroid
bug.summary: Slight documentation typo in CPU speed discussion
bug.description:
The CPU version code says:
The default CPU version takes ~0.2 seconds per image on Ubuntu (~50x slower than GPU) while the MKL version provides a roughly 2x speedup at ~0.4 seconds
I think this number is images/frames per second rather than seconds per image. Is that the case?

comments.comment: Thanks for the catch! Fixed in my local doc, it'll be pushed with my next commit within the next week.
